title: Draconic (attribute)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The draconic attribute is assigned to monsters that are weak to dragonbane weapons.

content:
This article is about the draconic attribute. For the race, see Dragon (race).

The draconic attribute is assigned to monsters that are weak to dragonbane weapons.

In addition to dragons, monsters created from dragonkin experiments tend to be draconic. This includes hydras, drakes, wyrms, wyverns, and the Great Olm.

Dragons tend to be fiery, but other dragonkin experiments tend not to be.

Effects[edit | edit source]

  • The dragon hunter crossbow will have 30% increased accuracy and 25% increased damage.
  • The dragon hunter lance will have 20% increased accuracy and damage.

rawContent:
{{otheruses|the draconic attribute|the race|Dragon (race)}}
The '''draconic attribute''' is assigned to monsters that are weak to [[dragonbane]] weapons.

In addition to dragons, monsters created from [[dragonkin]] experiments tend to be draconic. This includes [[hydra]]s, [[drake]]s, [[wyrm]]s, [[wyvern]]s, and the [[Great Olm]].

Dragons tend to be [[fiery (attribute)|fiery]], but other dragonkin experiments tend not to be.

==Effects==
* The [[dragon hunter crossbow]] will have 30% increased accuracy and 25% increased damage.
* The [[dragon hunter lance]] will have 20% increased accuracy and damage.

==List of monsters==
{{Bestiarytable|fromletter=A|toletter=Z|levelselect=no|levelsort=no|attribute=dragon}}

==Excluded monsters==
Despite being canonically draconic, these monsters are unaffected by the above effects.
* [[Elvarg]]
* [[Revenant dragon]]
* [[Zulrah]]

{{Monster attribute}}
